sentences.en: A nasal spray or drops would ease your symptoms, but don't overuse them or further congestion could result.
sentences.cn: 鼻腔喷剂或滴剂能减轻症状，但请勿使用过频，否则鼻塞可能会加重。

sentences.en: Don't overuse heated appliances on you hair.
sentences.cn: 不要过多地使用电热器具弄头发。

sentences.en: However, overuse or abuse of code - switching may also reap negative results.
sentences.cn: 但是, 语码转换在课堂中不可滥用,过多或不当使用也会造成一些负面影响.

sentences.en: In writing about our hard times, we are apt to overuse the word " grim ".
sentences.cn: 在描写我们艰苦的日子的时候, 我们每每过多地使用 “ 严肃 ” 这个字眼.

sentences.en: Long - term overuse of alcohol, for example, can cause alcoholic hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 例如, 长期 嗜酒会引起酒精性肝炎.

sentences.en: Love is a word cheapened by overuse.
sentences.cn: “爱”这个字眼用得太滥不值钱了。

sentences.en: Note the overuse of stress on certain words for emphasis and exaggeration.
sentences.cn: 标出为强调和夸张某些词过度使用的重音.

sentences.en: Overuse can cause stress fractures, are very small cracks in the bone.
sentences.cn: 使用过度可导致应力性骨折(骨头上极小的裂缝).

sentences.en: Overuse of the internet has become a household worry in China.
sentences.cn: 过度使用网络在中国已经成为一种家庭烦恼.

sentences.en: Sagittarians an active, sensitive liver that instantly suffers from overuse of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 射手座的肝非常脆弱,饮用大量的酒精让他易患肝炎.

sentences.en: Some guitar players tend to overuse the wah - wah pedal.
sentences.cn: 一些吉他手往往会滥用“哇哇”踏板.

sentences.en: Students tend to overuse certain words.
sentences.cn: 学生往往会滥用某些词语。

sentences.en: Supplies are under increasing threat from overuse and pollution.
sentences.cn: 由于滥用和污染，供应正受到日益严重的威胁。

sentences.en: Surface subsidence ( ground depression ) caused by the overuse of ground water.
sentences.cn: 过度抽取地下水引起的地面沉降.

sentences.en: The overuse of the work expedite come to mind here.
sentences.cn: 这里又涉及到“尽快”这个指令的滥用问题了.

sentences.en: The whole food chain is affected by the overuse of chemicals in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 整个食物链因农业生产过程过多使用化学品而受到影响。

trans.tran_en: to use something too much, especially so that it is not effective any more or it is damaged
